    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120430</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">S pomočjo zvočnika  smo v cevi vzpostavili stojni val</string>
            <string language="en">Using a speaker, a standing sound wave has been set up inside a tube</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mit einem Lautsprecher ist eine stehende 
Schallwelle innerhalb eines Gefäßes aufgestellt worden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En utilisant un haut-parleur, une vague saine 
debout a été installée à l'intérieur d'un tube</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando um altofalante, uma onda sadia ereta foi 
ajustada acima dentro de um tubo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando un altoparlante, un'onda sonora diritta è 
stata installata all'interno di un tubo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποιώντας έναν ομιλητή, ένα μόνιμο υγιές κύμα
έχει οργανωθεί μέσα σε έναν σωλήνα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usando un altavoz, una onda acústica derecha se 
ha instalado dentro de un tubo</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">S pomočjo zvočnika smo v cevi vzpostavili stojni val.</string>
            <string language="en">With the use of a speaker a standing sound wave has been set up inside a tube.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">stoječe valovanje</string>
            <string language="en">standing wave</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zvok</string>
            <string language="en">sound</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mit dem Gebrauch eines Lautsprechers ist eine 
stehende Schallwelle innerhalb eines Gefäßes aufgestellt worden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Avec l'utilisation d'un haut-parleur une vague 
saine debout a été installée à l'intérieur d'un tube.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Com o uso de um altofalante uma onda sadia ereta 
foi ajustada acima dentro de um tubo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Con l'uso di un altoparlante un'onda sonora 
diritta è stata installata all'interno di un tubo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Με τη χρήση ενός ομιλητή ένα μόνιμο υγιές κύμα 
έχει οργανωθεί μέσα σε έναν σωλήνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Con el uso de un altavoz una onda acústica 
derecha se ha instalado dentro de un tubo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stehende Welle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ton</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
